info.game_comments:
Ken Jennings game 68.
U.S. presidential election coverage on 2004-11-02 bumped airdates for games this week by one day, resulting in a Saturday airdate for an original episode.

jeopardy_round: I'M A PEPPER, YOU'RE A PEPPER

(1, 1).clue: In the late 11th century this peninsula contained the kingdoms of Leon, Castile, Navarre & Aragon

(2, 1).clue: Holland Taylor plays mom to Jon Cryer & Charlie Sheen on this sitcom

(3, 1).clue: In a nursery rhyme, he "picked a peck of pickled peppers"

(4, 1).clue: Most of a shark's brain is devoted to this sense

(4, 5).clue: Male lions are the only cats to have them & they darken as they grow

(1, 1).clue: John Wheeler named this singularity in the late 1960s; the Russians called it a collapsar

(6, 1).clue: And old proverb says not to do this "till you come to it"

(2, 2).clue: In 1976 Elton John wrote & duetted with Kiki Dee on this world-conquering smash hit
